description.value: Send a software trigger to the digitizer, provided that the option SwTrg is enabled in the parameter WaveTriggerSource and/or EventTriggerSource
Absolute value of the ADCInput signal baseline
Number of samples used to average the baseline of the Energy Filter: Fixed = depends on another reg; Low = 16 samples; Medium Low = 64 samples; Medium High = 256 samples; High = 1k.
Energy Filter Baseline Evaluation Guard after a peak in samples
Energy Filter Baseline Evaluation Guard after a peak in time
Factor to convert ADC counts to volts

ADC Veto width in nanoseconds. It allows to set a protection time after the ADC saturation. In case the ADC saturation generates an inhibit, the event is not saved; in case the ADC saturation does not generate an inhibit, the triggers generated during the veto width are flagged.
AntiCoincidence Mask
Delay of the CFD in samples
Delay of the CFD in nanoseconds
CFD Fraction

Set gain of a Variable Gain Amplifier

Length of waveform coming before the position of the trigger in the waveform in 8ns steps.

Duration of the waveform

Arms the digitizer to start an acquisition.
Clear data from memories. Registers content is not affected.
Disarms the acquisition and prevents the digitizer to start a new run.
Set a timer that reboots the board after 4 seconds. The communication is lost and must be established again after the reboot. The default firmware is loded.
Delete calibration file and reload it from flash or, if invalid, use default calibration
Resets the board. This command sets all registers to the default value and clear data from memories.

Start the acquisition, provided that the option SWcmd is enabled in the parameter StartSource.
Stop the acquisition, provided that the option SWcmd is enabled in the parameter StartSource.
